General.Name: Zhejiang Kaishan Compressor
General.Description: Kaishan Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells compressor products in China and internationally. The company provides screw air compressors, mobile screw air compressor, centrifugal compressors, scroll compressors, fluid machinery, refrigeration equipment, expansion power equipment, process gas compressors, and purification equipment. It offers waste heat power generation and geothermal power generation equipment. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Kaishan Compressor Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kaishan Group Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Kaishan Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Kaishan Holding Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 9 Kaixuan West Road, Quzhou, China, 324002
